title: Help needed with two fonts
content:
I hope that somebody can help me with these two fonts.  
Thanks a lot!  
Have a great Sunday!

Lililoo

author: Lililoo123

comments.content: Ha ha and I know that font!!! Tried Creampuff, Marketing Script etc. LOL But why akward? Maybe you already answered me once LOL
awkward "o"... i'd say because if the less than nice connection to the w. weird.

Found the second one myself! It is Blackout by Tyler Finck. [http://www.tylerfinck.com/2009/05/the-sursly-font-blackout-now-downloada...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018053409/http:/www.tylerfinck.com/2009/05/the-sursly-font-blackout-now-downloadable/ "http://www.tylerfinck.com/2009/05/the-sursly-font-blackout-now-downloadable/") Found it at Puglypixel.com!  
And now I understand defiantart LOL!
